title: midtrans
description: Calculate the midpoint transform from a series of input transforms.

transforms.title: Input transform files
transforms.description: List of input transform files (e.g. transform1.mat transform2.mat ... transformN.mat)

output_matrix.title: Output matrix
output_matrix.description: Output filename for the resulting matrix

template_image.title: Template image

separate_basename.title: Separate matrices basename
separate_basename.description: Basename for the output of separate matrices (final name includes a number; e.g. img2mid0001.mat)
